channel.title: neo4j-browser on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in neo4j-browser on Mark Needham

item.title: Neo4j Browser: Expected entity id to be an integral value
item.description: unwind range(0,1000) AS id create (:Person {id: id}) :param ids: [0] match (p:Person) where p.id in {ids} return p ╒════════╕ │"p" │ ╞════════╡ │{"id":0}│ └────────┘ match (p:Person) where id(p) in {ids} return p Neo.ClientError.Statement.TypeError Expected entity id to be an integral value match (p:Person) where id(p) in [id in {ids} | toInteger(id)] return p ╒════════╕ │"p" │ ╞════════╡ │{"id":0}│ └────────┘
